main.name: Zoestha UG
main.description: Here will be your description. Use this to describe what you do or whatever you feel best describes yourself to a potential employer
main.bio: Experienced application Engineer with a demonstrated history of working in the electrical and electronic manufacturing industry. Skilled in Acoustics, C++, software development, Electrical Engineering and Matlab. Strong engineering professional with a Msc focused in Electrical engineering from Aalborg university.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.degree: Masters of Science in Electrical Engineering
education.description: Three semesters program including fundamental and advanced courses in acoustics and signal processing.

education.degree: Masters of Science in Electrical Engineering
education.description: Master of Sciences in electrical engineering; Specialization in signal processing and telecommunication systems

work.company: GFaI Gesellschaft zur Förderung angewandter Informatik e. V.
work.title: Acoustic Application Engineer
work.description: Software development in Digital Signal Processing with application to architectural and psycho-acoustic and sound intensity. On-site measurement and expertise on behalf of GFaI.

work.title: Acoustic Application Engineer
work.description: Customer advisory service and support; representation on international congress and exhibitions; software development for psycho-acoustic analysis (Loudness, Sharpness, Roughness) and architectural acoustics (Speech Transmission Index, Energy parameters).

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
